about_the_game:
Lawless Lands

The Second Soul DLC allows you to fully customize a second character - exactly like how you can for the main character of the base game - to use as a companion! No longer will you have to face the dangers of the lawless lands alone or with premade companions! Did you wish that you could customize your favorite companion in the past? Now you can!

Features:
  • Create a custom companion and fully personalize them however you wish!
  • The companion has no limitations to usable equipment or skills - build them with your vision in mind!
  • Works with the skin pack DLCs!
  • Name and outfits can be changed just like with the main character!
  • 50 Gold Lords added to your inventory to start them off with equipment, 5 fame, and 50 experience to give them a bit of a boost!

Recently Added: You can now get another Second Soul Character if the previous has died! (The extra money and fame is only given the first time)

PLEASE NOTE: IN ORDER TO CREATE THE CHARACTER, YOU MUST SPEAK TO ELTHRED IN THE PYRSHEN STRONGHOLD - IT'S IN THE CITY CENTER! YOU CAN GET THEM ANYTIME YOU WISH! YOU DO NOT NEED TO START A NEW GAME!
